text: yadi tum us (nabee) kee sahaayata nahin karoge, to allaah ne usakee sahaayata us samay[1] kee hai, jab kaafiron ne use (makka se) nikaal diya. vah do mein doosare the. jab donon gupha mein the, jab vah apane saathee se kah rahe theh udaaseen na ho, nishchay allaah hamaare saath hai[2]. to allaah ne apanee or se shaanti utaar dee aur aapako aisee sena se samarthan diya, jise tumane nahin dekha aur kaafiron kee baat neechee kar dee aur allaah kee baat hee oonchee rahee aur allaah prabhutvashaalee tatvagy hai
